author: Rolando Arias
description: Rolando’s inspiration: “My cocktail name is Volver a Empezar, it means ‘to start over’ in Spanish. It is inspired by breakfast ingredients at the start of a new day and celebrates the continued desire to overcome adversities, just like the Bacardí family did.”
name: Volver a Empezar
recipeIngredient: 55 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
